data.title: Holiday Closing Schedule
data.meta_description: When a holiday is observed on a Monday, ALL DC DMV Service Centers, Adjudication Services and the Inspection Station will be closed on that Monday and the preceding Saturday.
data.text:
When a holiday is observed on a Monday, ALL DC DMV Service Centers, Adjudication Services and the Inspection Station will be closed on that Monday and the preceding Saturday.

2024 Holidays

Date Holiday All DMV Facilities Closed January 1, 2024 New Year's Day Saturday, December 30, 2023 & Monday, January 1, 2024 January 15, 2024 Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s Birthday Saturday, January 13 & Monday, January 15 February 19, 2024 Washington's Birthday Saturday, February 17 & Monday, February 19 April 16, 2024 DC Emancipation Day Tuesday, April 16 May 27, 2024 Memorial Day Saturday, May 25 & Monday, May 27 June 19, 2024 Juneteenth National Independence Day Wednesday, June 19 July 4, 2024 Independence Day Thursday, July 4 September 2, 2024 Labor Day Saturday, August 31 & Monday, September 2 October 14, 2024 Indigenous Peoples' Day Saturday, October 12 & Monday, October 14 November 11, 2024 Veterans Day Saturday, November 9 & Monday, November 11 November 28, 2024 Thanksgiving Day Thursday, November 28 December 25, 2024 Christmas Day Wednesday, December 25
